import{Status}from"@api/api-ko-schema.auto";import get from"lodash/get";import orderBy from"lodash/orderBy";export function orderByASC(data,key){return orderBy(data,[function(item){return item[key].toLowerCase();}],["asc"]);}/*
 * @param data
 * @param key
 */export function orderByDESC(data,key){return orderBy(data,[function(item){return item[key].toLowerCase();}],["desc"]);}/**
 *
 * @param data [] or {}
 * @returns remove the inactive items in data
 *
 */export function grepActive(data){var dataIsArray=Array.isArray(data);var dataIsObject=null!==data&&!dataIsArray&&"object"===typeof data;if(dataIsArray){return data.filter(function(item){return get(item,"status")!==Status.Inactive;}).map(function(item){return grepActive(item);});}else if(dataIsObject){var res={};Object.keys(data).forEach(function(item){res[item]=grepActive(data[item]);});return res;}else{return data;}}export function grepActiveQueryResult(result){return grepActive(result.data);}
